main event: On July 18, 1961, a husband and wife observed three bright lights in the sky traveling from east to west at a high rate of speed in Monticello, Illinois.
interesting points: The lights were 30 to 40 feet in diameter and evenly spaced,The lights appeared to be rotating in a circular motion,The witnesses reported that the lights disappeared over the horizon,The sighting was made by civilians traveling in a car,Weather conditions were clear with calm winds.
sighted object: three bright lights in the sky
